headline: ExxonMobil's Valuation Remains Premium: Are Investors Overpaying?

headline: Chevron's Texas Job Cuts: What's Really Driving the Layoffs?
summary: CVX plans to cut 200 Texas jobs by July as part of a global overhaul aiming to trim up to 9,000 roles by 2026.

headline: Oil & Gas Deals Are Tanking. The World’s Top M&A Law Firm Has Been Here Before
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Kirkland & Ellis spent a decade building a billion dollar-plus energy and infrastructure business and becoming the top legal adviser for US oil and gas deals. It was perfectly placed to benefit from Donald Trump’s “drill, baby, drill” agenda. headline: 3 Top Energy Stocks to Buy Without Hesitation in June
